title: Molecular characterization and genotype development of transgenic Camelina accumulating high levels of omega-3 long chain polyunsaturated fatty acids
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Underpinned successful application to DEFRA for GM field trial Agriculture, Food and Drink Societal,Economic
findingsText: How to make and maintain a GM plant that makes fish oils . Agriculture, Food and Drink
